Post.title: Gulp
Post.content:
gulp

Linux C Automake makefile

automake Hash gulp

Gulp Node.js Grunt I/O Grunt Grunt I/O Grunt Gulp Grunt gulp vs grunt

Gulp Gulp NodeJS Pipe

Gulp

Node.js NPM Gulp 

$ npm install gulp -g

gulp package.json 

$ npm init    # package.json 
$ npm install gulp --save-dev    # gulp

package.json devDependencies gulp node_modules gulp

Gulp

Gulp Gulp Gulp

  • Sass compile (gulp-ruby-sass) # css
  • Autoprefixer (gulp-autoprefixer) # css
  • Minify CSS with cssnano (gulp-cssnano) # css
  • JSHint (gulp-jshint) # JS
  • Concatenation (gulp-concat) #
  • Uglify (gulp-uglify) #
  • Compress images (gulp-imagemin) #
  • LiveReload (gulp-livereload) #
  • Caching of images so only changed images are compressed (gulp-cache) #
  • Notify of changes (gulp-notify) #
  • Clean files for a clean build (del) #

Gulp 

$ npm install [package-name] --save-dev

Gulp

Github node_chat 

// 
var del = require('del'),
    gulp = require('gulp'),
    cache = require('gulp-cache'),
    jshint = require('gulp-jshint'),
    concat = require('gulp-concat'),
    uglify = require('gulp-uglify'),
    rename = require('gulp-rename'),
    notify = require('gulp-notify'),
    cssnano = require('gulp-cssnano'),
    imagemin = require('gulp-imagemin'),
    livereload = require('gulp-livereload'),
    autoprefixer = require('gulp-autoprefixer');

// 
var srcPaths = {
    scripts: ['./public/javascripts/*.js'],
    images: './public/images/*',
    styles: './public/stylesheets/*.css'
};

// 
var destPaths = {
    all: './build/**',
    scripts: './build/script',
    images: './build/image',
    styles: './build/style'
};

// 
gulp.task('analysis', function() {
    return gulp.src(srcPaths.scripts)
        .pipe(jshint())
        .pipe(jshint.reporter('default'))
        .pipe(notify({message: 'Analysis task complete.'}));
});

// 1. 
gulp.task('scripts', ['analysis'], function() {
    return gulp.src(srcPaths.scripts)
        .pipe(concat('main.js'))
        .pipe(gulp.dest(destPaths.scripts))
        .pipe(rename({suffix: '.min'}))
        .pipe(uglify())
        .pipe(gulp.dest(destPaths.scripts))
        .pipe(notify({message: 'Scripts task complete.'}));
});

// 2. 
gulp.task('images', function() {
    return gulp.src(srcPaths.images)
        //  imagemin  cache 
        .pipe(cache(imagemin({ optimizationLevel: 3, progressive: true, interlaced: true })))
        .pipe(gulp.dest(destPaths.images))
        .pipe(notify({message: 'Images task complete.'}));
});

// 3. 
gulp.task('styles', function() {
    return gulp.src(srcPaths.styles)
        .pipe(autoprefixer('last 2 version', 'safari 5', 'ie 8', 'ie 9', 'opera 12.1', 'ios 6', 'android 4'))
        .pipe(gulp.dest(destPaths.styles))
        .pipe(rename({suffix: '.min'}))
        .pipe(cssnano())
        .pipe(gulp.dest(destPaths.styles))
        .pipe(notify({message: 'Styles task complete.'}));
});

// 
gulp.task('clean', function(cb) {
    //  build 
    return del([destPaths.scripts, destPaths.images, destPaths.styles], cb);
});

// 
gulp.task('default', ['clean'], function() {
    gulp.start('scripts', 'images', 'styles');
});

// 
gulp.task('watch', function() {
    // 
    gulp.watch(srcPaths.scripts, ['scripts']);
    gulp.watch(srcPaths.images, ['images']);
    gulp.watch(srcPaths.styles, ['styles']);
    //  livereload 
    livereload.listen();
    // 
    gulp.watch([destPaths.all]).on('change', livereload.changed);
});

##### Most middleware (like session) is no longer bundled with Express and must be installed 

sessionExpress4.xExpress3.x
``` javascript
var express = require('express');
var MongoStore = require('connect-mongo')(express);

app.use(express.session({
    secret: settings.cookie_secret,
    store: new MongoStore({
        db: settings.db
    })
}));
```

``` javascript
var session    = require('express-session');

    secret: settings.cookie_secret,
    store: new MongoStore({
        db: settings.db
    })
}));
```

 Node NPM  [csv to json](https://github.com/Keyang/node-csvtojson)  CSV  JSON 


1.  Excel  CSV 
2.  csvtojson  CSV  JSON 
3.  JSON 

> :  Mac  MicroOffice  EXCEL  CSV   CSV ?

 CSV  [Libre Office](https://www.libreoffice.org/) Libreoffice  CSV  UTF-8 ,  [Google Sheets](https://www.google.com/sheets/about/) 

## 

`npm install csvtojson --save `


```js
/** csv file
 account,password,company,username,phone
 test1@demo.com,123456,,,13112310168
 test2@demo.com,123456,,,13327223199
**/

const csvFilePath='<path to csv file>';
const csv=require('csvtojson');
let userData = [];
csv()
.fromFile(csvFilePath)
.on('json',(jsonObj)=>{
	//  CSV  JSON 
	userData.push(jsonObj);
})
.on('done',(error)=>{
	console.log('result: ' + JSON.stringify(userData));
	/**
	[
    	{
        	account:'test1@demo.com',
        	password:'123456',
        	company:'',
        	username:'',
        	phone: '13112310168'
    	},
    	{
        	account:'test2@demo.com',
        	password:'123456',
        	company:'',
        	username:'',
        	phone: '13327223199'
    	}
	]
	**/
})
```

Post.content:
IP

hostsIP

gethostbyname() hosts

/etc/hosts

host(192.168.1.1)
/etc/host.conf multi on (IP)IP

IP

hostent(host entry)

h_addr_list in_addr

IP

void resolve_domain_name(const unsigned char* host_name)
{
    struct hostent *host_info = NULL;
    char target_ip[32];
    char **pptr;
    char *address = NULL;

    memset(target_ip, 0, sizeof(target_ip));
    //
    host_info = gethostbyname(host_name);
    if (NULL == host_info)
    {
        printf("DNS resolve error![%s]\n", host_name);
        return;
    }

    //IP
    pptr = host_info->h_addr_list;
    while(NULL != *pptr)
    {
        //[]  []
        address = inet_ntoa(*(struct in_addr *)*pptr);
        //address = inet_ntop(host_info->h_addrtype, *pptr, target_ip, sizeof(target_ip));
        if (NULL == address)
        {
            printf("Addr convert error!\n");
            return;
        }
        printf("IP Address = [%s]\n", address);
        pptr ++;
    }
}

inet_ntoa
inet_ntoa() inet_ntoa()
inet_ntoa() IP
